name: Shadow Force: Glitchworld
description:
SCROLL DOWN FOR MOBILE & PC 

or CLICK HERE FOR APP STORE   & GOOGLE PLAY 

Have fun with this parodic retro platform-shooter! 

HOW TO PLAY (keyboard):

to START: click mouse

to MOVE: arrow keys

to JUMP: space bar

to FIRE: ctrl

You can DOWNLOAD the game below for PC and mobile (and play with a joypad... which is way better:-)

WHAT IS THIS GAME?

GLITCHWORLD is the sequel to the (not so much) renowned game "Shadow Force 3000"  (play it HERE).

Well... to be fair... it's not really a sequel... You see, Skel and Oree - our main characters - have... BROKEN  the original game and try to sell it as a follow-up title... 

Now, you are GLITCHING from one level to another while you play... Sorry about that...

But who are these characters anyway?

Well...  What happens to videogame characters when they are not in the game? What do they do?  How do they live? 

Find out with SKEL & OREE, two "pixel-actors"  of a forgotten retro game called "Shadow Force 3000".

Next to this homebrew ANIMATED SHOW depicting their everyday life, we also have retro film - and videogame reviews, presented by our pixelised protagonists. 

Meet them on YOUTUBE:  HERE

GAME CREDITS: 

a Fred Neuen game - developed by burakk78 - pixelart by lucaslundin - backgrounds and sets by ansimuz - music by Sound_Forces

CONTACT: contact@thisisradar.com
